channel.title: Funco on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Funco on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: It’s New To You
item.description: Today in Tedium: In an era when digital storage is basically unlimited and space is running out by the second, there’s still a basic charm to physical objects that we’ve yet to really lose. Video games are a great example of this. Despite the fact that you can literally download any game under the sun and play it instantly, there is a quite healthy business online and elsewhere for physical product.
